text: Families (original title: Belles Familles) is a 2015 French comedy-drama film co-written and directed by Jean-Paul Rappeneau, his first directorial effort since 2003's Bon Voyage. Filming began on 16 June 2014 in Blois. The film was released in theatres on 14 October 2015. It was shown in the Special Presentations section of the 2015 Toronto International Film Festival. == Cast == * Mathieu Amalric as Jérôme Varenne * Marine Vacth as Louise * Gilles Lellouche as Grégoire Piaggi * Nicole Garcia as Suzanne Varenne * Karin Viard as Forence Deffe * Guillaume de Tonquédec as Jean-Michel Varenne * André Dussollier as Pierre Cotteret * Gemma Chan as Chen-Lin * Claude Perron as Fabienne * Jean-Marie Winling as Vouriot * Yves Jacques as Maître Ribain ==References== ==External links== * Category:2015 films Category:2015 comedy- drama films Category:French-language films Category:French comedy-drama films Category:French films Category:Films directed by Jean-Paul Rappeneau Category:Films with screenplays by Jean-Paul Rappeneau
title: Families (film)
